array.string: iconv.c: export _libiconv_version (74104092)
various headers: InstallAPI compliance (includes and forward declarations) (74104092)
various: fix truncation warnings (74104092)
citrus_esdb.c: use realloc() instead of reallocarray() (74104092)
citrus_csmapper.c: use OSByteOrder swapping macros (74104092)
iconv.h, iconv_set_relocation_prefix.c: fix spelling of libiconv_set_relocation_prefix (74104092)
citrus_module.c: search the dyld cache for libiconv modules (74104092)
citrus_module.c: ignore versioning for on-lib dylibs and assert correct suffix (.dylib) (74104092)
csmapper: fix various mappings for GNU libiconv parity (74104092)
esdb: fix order of precedence for various charsets (74104092)
citrus_iconv.c: handle GNU-compatible WCHAR_T encoding (104607349)
citrus_iconv.c: GNU-compatible CHAR encoding name should be case insensitive (104607349)
bsd_iconv.c: don't clobber errno on successful iconv_open (105248919)
citrus_esdb.c: exclude @ filenames from listing (105868289)
citrus_mmap.c, citrus_module.c: prefix the simulator root as needed (111163759)
encoding modules: avoid init_state() that just zero out state (110883172)
citrus_iconv_std.c, citrus_iconv_std_local.h: optimize 1:1 conversions (110883172)
citrus_csmapper.c, citrus_csmapper.h, citrus_iconv_std.c, citrus_iconv_std_local.h: optimize mapper_none conversions (110883172)
many: process many characters at once (110883172)
citrus_iconv_std.c: handle EILSEQ on output (113828035)
mkcsmapper: support / TRANSLIT in mapping data (115429361)
tablegen.c: support --filter (112723280)
many: implement transliteration (112723280)
citrus_none.c, ISO646.src: enforce a 7bit restriction for ASCII (112723280)
citrus_iconv_std.c: "GNU-compatible" EILSEQ + //IGNORE should increment inval (115458746)
citrus_utf1632.c: skip BOMs in the data stream (120338891)
citrus_utf7.c: don't special-case nul byte, return EILSEQ (122191103)
